# milkee-plugin-ext

This is a plugin for [milkee](https://www.npmjs.com/package/milkee) .

Replace ".coffee" / ".litcoffee" extension with ".js" in import and require!

## Usage

### setup

#### coffee.config.cjs

```js
const replaceExt = require('milkee-plugin-ext');

module.exports = {
  // ...
  milkee: {
    plugins: [
      replaceExt(),
      // ...
    ]
  }
}
```

### Run

```sh
milkee
# or
npx milkee
```

## Example

```coffee
myScript = require "./script.coffee"

myScript()
```

```js
// Generated by CoffeeScript 2.7.0
(function() {
  var myScript;

  myScript = require("./script.js");

  myScript();

}).call(this);
```
